io.dropwizard.metrics

Interface ReporterFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Discoverable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseFormattedReporterFactory, BaseReporterFactory, ConsoleReporterFactory, CsvReporterFactory, Slf4jReporterFactory

    public interface ReporterFactory
extends Discoverable
    A service provider interface for creating metrics reporters.

    To create your own, just:

    1. Create a class which implements ReporterFactory.
    2. Annotate it with @JsonTypeName and give it a unique type name.
    3. Add a META-INF/services/io.dropwizard.metrics.ReporterFactory file with your implementation's full class name to the class path.
    See Also:
    ConsoleReporterFactory, CsvReporterFactory, Slf4jReporterFactory
